description: This source file defines a utility function to retrieve a free network port. It primarily imports the socket module and provides the 'get_free_port' function which creates a socket, binds it to an ephemeral port, and returns that port number.

methods.name: get_free_port(udp = False)
methods.description: Returns an available free network port by creating a socket, binding to an ephemeral port, and retrieving the assigned port number.
